channel.title: Sorta Cool/Easy Prank (Harmless)
channel.description:
Well this is only for windows. Take a screenshot of your desktop. (Prt Scr button above insert) (If you want to be really realistic, don't have any windows in taskbar and remove the clock from the task bar as well.)Then set this screenshot as your background. Lastly you go to the Task manager (Ctrl+Alt+Del) Then you find "explorer.exe" and end that process. This will remove the real taskbar and all the real icons, leaving them with a background picture and a headache if they are incompetent with computers. *I'm not responsible for anything that happens to the computer you do this on. It usually fixes if you just log off then on again, or just restart your computer.
Yeah most people know this probably, but it's my first tutorial =/.

item.title: Sorta Cool/Easy Prank (Harmless)
item.dc:creator: @darkilla darkilla
item.description:
@darkilla wrote:

at skool when people went 2 go 2 the toilet wed go into notepad press alt n and bring up like 3000 notepads and theyd be sitting there trying 2 exit out of em
lol same but we open internet explorer and press ctrl n lol luv that ;D annoys them so much only the smart people would log off and log bak in

Read full topic
